title: Is there any way i can register for pesu btech counselling now anyhow ?pls its urgent
content: Please help any senior , i have 97 percentile , i am a dropper . I have no other good options but i missed the date now i am not being able to register . Please find me a way

comments.body: bhai iiit ap lele ya lnmiit lele
Cant join anymore by anymeans? In round 2 counselling wont they allow us to register once more?
Which iiit? Lnmiit placements are not as good as pes
too late brother too late, we had registered back in jan
not for new registrations, only for kcet councelling its open now
Keep checking there will be another round after 7 July
Are u sure we will be able to register again there ?
Nah Man, For jee mains they had opened after 1st round for 2-3 days ig but still keep checking out you never know

Call 08010297297 and ask about your concern, though it may take a long time to connect. But still you ask them, they will respond,
